pkgmetadata.longdescription: The Hoard memory allocator is a fast, scalable, and memory-efficient memory allocator for shared-memory multiprocessors. Hoard is a drop-in replacement for malloc() and can dramatically improve the performance of multithreaded programs running on multiprocessors.
